name: PhatSnacks
tagline: A Twitter bot; tweet it a food, it'll reply with a recipe.
body:
### Welcome to PhatSnacks.
It's a bot: tweet a food at it, it'll reply with a recipe.

This is my first crack at writing a Twitter bot. Just scratching an itch for the moment, to grok how all this works (I hope I'm keeping this simple enough to start with).

### Authors and Contributors
@fmailhot
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
